title: The Best #RaceToHundred Hosts
description: I had the opportunity to observe Avie's work as a community manager and public speaker. From my observation, Avie's dedication and skill are commendable. They consistently hosted daily engaging and inclusive spaces for 100 days and their ability as a public speaker is also exemplary. They were always willing to support people to develop their public speaking skills. They also have a great ability to communicate and interact with people, fostering a positive and inclusive environment. Overall, Avie has a commendable skillset and qualities that could be useful to anyone looking for a community manager and public speaker.
